ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Ok next silly question
ygData.msgSnippet: I turned the guild leadership over to someone before I quit Brell. Can t remember who eventually wound up with it. With the guild purges for guilds with less
ygData.messageBody:
I turned the guild leadership over to someone before I quit Brell. Can't
remember who eventually wound up with it. With the guild purges for guilds
with less than 10 members, I would imagine it may have been wiped out.

Let me also encourage you to come over to Rodcet. My Druid, Kerik, will be
glad to help you PL a bit to get up to speed again. Also there are any
number of people who will gladly re-equip you on Rodcet too.

(Hello Christina! Hope you are well.)

Hugs,
David

----- Original Message -----
From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:15 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Ok next silly question


>
> Hi Owen,
>
> There is a gay guild on Brell, namely the (now defunct) mystical alliance.
> I believe David (who may still be reading this list) is the guild owner. I
> have an officer character on Brell still in greater faydark (perhaps in
> freeport as well not sure) and I can add you to the guild if you would
> like. Just email me and we can work out a time.
